channel.title: Verilog on Khaleel Khan's CV
channel.description: Recent content in Verilog on Khaleel Khan's CV

item.title: Microprocessor Design in Verilog
item.description: The purpose of this lab is to implement a THUMB processor with multiple pipeline stages that executes the given C-programs assembled for the ARM THUMB instruction set in Verilog. This processor features a 5 stage pipeline,hazard detection and dataforwarding.The CPU runs at a maximum frequency of 2.857 GHz.
